title: User
description: Defines a user for adding to simulation

arrivaldatetime.description: The arrival time of the user - RFC3339 date string from Date.now()).toISOString(). eg 2017-06-23T10:36:20.685Z

departuredatetime.description: The departure time of the user  RFC3339 date string from Date.now()).toISOString(). eg 2017-06-23T10:36:20.685Z

vehicleId.description: Id of vehicle model from Vehicle database: if nothing passed a random vehiocle will be assigned

currentcharge.description: State of charge of vehicle on arrival:percentage - for now will be simulated

netformcharge.description: Required state of charge on departure:percentage - if nothing passed then 80% is assumed
